description.value:
Special: Balanced, Felling (4), Tearing, Warp Weapon,Daemon Wep

Note: Base Weapon: Sword.Daemon Willpower 75 (Daemon Prince Nach'ra'ael), Bind Str 4. Attributes: Accursed, Impossibly Sharp, Vicious. All Attibutes accounted in weapon stats. Warning: All Daemon weapons want you dead or possessed, this one especially.
